The  value of  policy-class(<0-7> and 255).
The  default value of  policy-class is 255.
                  
The policy-class range of 0 and 7 and 255 cannot be existed the same time.
For example 1,if we set the value  0 and 255 at the same time(255 behind),the final value is 255.
For example 2,if we set the value  255 and 0 at the same time(0 behind ),the final value is 0.
For example 3,if we set the value  0,255,1 and 3 at the same time the final value is 1 and 3.

policy-class_schema.description: The configuration of SR tunnel's policy class.

classes.description:
The  value of  policy-class(<0-7> and 255).
The  default value of  policy-class is 255.
                  
The policy-class range of 0 and 7 and 255 cannot be existed the same time.
For example 1,if we set the value  0 and 255 at the same time(255 behind),the final value is 255.
For example 2,if we set the value  255 and 0 at the same time(0 behind ),the final value is 0.
For example 3,if we set the value  0,255,1 and 3 at the same time the final value is 1 and 3.
